title: Denta Shift - Practice
description: A web application where dentists can find dental professionals based on their offices' needs.

title: Instock - Practice
description: A web application where the customer can manage their Warehouses and Inventory.

title: Purely Chic - Practice
technologies: Vite, Sass, React.js, Node.js, Axios, Express.js, CORS
description: A web application where users can find beauty products that are eco-friendly.

title: BandSite - Practice
description: A website built for a a band, where they can publish their next tour dates and their fans can leave their comments in a built-in forum.

title: Coffee Shop - Practice
description: A website built for a coffee shop, highlighting their menu and producs.

title: Hackathon - Winning Project
description: Front-end lead of a team of 4. A 24 hour hackathon sponsored by Telus with the aim of tackling the theme: Consumers are experiencing option paralysis. The solution: a feature with Artificial Intelligence that provides a list of shows that you may like based on an entry and where you can find them.

title: Hackathon #1: Your fav quotes
description: A web application where you can get quotes from a fun character of a Sitcom with three external APIs.
